name: Niji Flowers
description:
This model generates images with colorful flowers, artwork style. No matter where you go, may there be flowers with you all the way

The tagger word is "<niji-se-flowers>". We train on https://civitai.com/models/7371/rev-animated. For convenience, we provide our prompts for easy beginnings.

It would be very appreciated if you could share with me your interesting results. For any problem, feel free to ask in this post, I will reply ASAP.

meta.negativePrompt: no face, half face, solo, (worst quality:1.2), (low quality:1.2), (lowres:1.1), (monochrome:1.1), (greyscale), multiple views, comic, blurry, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, missing fingers

meta.prompt: <niji-se-flowers>, 1girl, naked, big booms, sexy, flowers on tits
